channel.title: Comments on: A return to Android

item.title: By: Mark Myers
item.dc:creator: Mark Myers
item.description: ill give the falcon pro a go as well as you are right the twitter client sucks
item.content:encoded: ill give the falcon pro a go as well as you are right the twitter client sucks

item.title: By: Darren
item.dc:creator: Darren
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013-1-18-a-return-to-android/#comment-91">Matt White</a>.
Oooh, okay, will give that a go. I have a Nexus 7 too.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Matt White.

Oooh, okay, will give that a go. I have a Nexus 7 too.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013-1-18-a-return-to-android/#comment-89">Darren</a>.
That's Falcon Pro my twitter client
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Darren.

That’s Falcon Pro my twitter client

item.title: By: Darren
item.dc:creator: Darren
item.description: Matt, what's the app between Chrome and the all-apps button?
item.content:encoded: Matt, what’s the app between Chrome and the all-apps button?
